B. Book an appointment (by phone) > Pay (in person)

Sub-services:
A. Book an appointment (online form) > Pay (in person)

B. Book an appointment (by phone) > Pay (in person)

Sub-services: Book an appointment (by phone) > Pay (in person)

Sub-services: Call to book a venue > Pay (?)

Sub-services: Call to book a registrar > Pay (?)

Sub-services: Call to book a venue

Sub-services: Book a licenced venue (phone) > Pay deposit (phone)

Sub-services: Book an appointment to give notice (online form) > Pay (in person)

Sub-services: Book an appointment (phone) > Pay (in person) > Book a date if having a ceremony (in person)

Sub-services:
A. Attend 

B. Plan an individual ceremony > Pick a venue > Pay

Name: Book a sport course
Sub-services: Go to Active Essex (www.activeessex.org) > Find training and courses > select course to book (online) > Pay (online)

Name: Book a outdoor activity
Sub-services:
A. Go to Essex Outdoors (https://www.essexoutdoors.com/) > Select activity to book (online) > Pay (online)

B. Go to Essex Outdoors (https://www.essexoutdoors.com/) > Select activity to book (Phone) > Pay (Phone)

Name: Book a park event
Sub-services:
A. Go to Visit Parks (http://www.visitparks.co.uk/) > Select event/activty to book (online) > pay (online)

B. A. Go to Visit Parks (http://www.visitparks.co.uk/) > Select event/activty to book (online) > pay (phone)???

Name: Book a work placement
Sub-services: Fill in form (online) > pay (online)

Name: Book a dance course
Sub-services:
Go to Essex Dance Theatre (http://essexdancetheatre.co.uk/)
> Book a class (PDF form: email /  post) > Pay (cash / cheque)

Name: Book a music course
Sub-services:
A. Go to Essex Music Hub (https://www.essexmusichub.org.uk/site/)
> Register an account > Select course > Pay (phone / cash / cheque)

B. Go to Essex Music Hub (https://www.essexmusichub.org.uk/site/)
> Select course > book on eventbrite

Name: Book an instrument
Sub-services:
A. Go to Essex Music Hub (https://www.essexmusichub.org.uk/site/)
> hire instrument form (online) >  Pay (phone / cash / cheque)?  > Book time for pickup / delivery (phone) 

B. .... get instrument delivered at a school

Name: Book a session
Sub-services: Go to Essex Music Hub > Fill in form > Submit

Name: Book an event at Essex Record Office
Sub-services: Go to essexrecordoffice.co.uk > Book > Pay

Name: Book ERO for a wedding
Sub-services: Check availability (by phone) > Book (via phone)

Name: Reserve a Library item
Sub-services:
A. Login account > Stock Search (online) > Reserve item (physical item) > notified of item available > pickup (in person)

B. Register > Login > Stock Search (online) > Reserve item (physical item) > notified of item available > pickup (in person) 

C. Register > Login > Stock Search (online) > find ebook (example) > register to ebook system > login ebook system > get ebook

Name: Renew Library item
Sub-services:
Get courtesy notification of upcoming due item (via email only if signed up for this) then...

A. Login account > select  item > renew
B. In person (kiosk)
C. In person (counter)

Name: (NT) Book Home Library service
Sub-services: Become nominated for the service (phone/email) > person comes to chat with them to understand needs > matched to a volunteer > volunteer visits

Name: Book a Library computer
Sub-services:
A. Go to the library

B. Login to https://librarybookings.essex.gov.uk/netloan/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=/netloan > Book?

Name: Book a space at a Library
Sub-services: Contact the library (call/email)

Name: Start a book group
Sub-services: Sign-up for a book group card (?) > create book group > reserve books for group > meet > finish book and return

Name: (NT) Apply for a flood grant - Property Level Resilience grant
Sub-services:
A. Check eligibility (online) > not eligible so leave

B. Check eligibility (online) > Eligible so fill in a form (online) > > wait for Lakeside Flood Solutions to contact me > book an appointment for my assessment (phone?) > get house assessed?....> get the grant (via supplier Lakeside)

Name: Book Demand Responsive Transport (DaRT)
Sub-services:
1. Call
2. Email

Name: (NT) Register in an accredited/special adult learning course
Sub-services: Search for a course (online) > Call to book interview > attend interview/assessment (in person) > Do test (online - in person) or interview only > get result (in person) > register into the course (in person) > Pay (in person)

Name: Cancel or rearrange a booking for interview (ACL)
Sub-services: Call

Name: Carers / Book a Short Break
Sub-services: Enter email and passport ID > pick an option > get confirmation (later?)

Name: Book a place services course
Sub-services:
A. Fill in form > Pay (online) > Get notification

B. Fill in form > Pay (invoice) > Get notification
